text: haey banda anak del ban mokadl kraoy anak teangnoh ( mou heu chi rin ning an sa r) puokke ban buongsuong som tha ao mcheasa robsa puok yeung. saum trong me tda aphytosa aoy puok yeung ning bangobaaun robsa puok yeung pimoun del mean chomnue phng . haey saum trong me tda kom thveu aoy chetd robsa puok yeung mean pheap chranen chhneanisa champoh banda anak del mean chomnue avei . ao mcheasa robsa puok yeung. pitabrakd nasa a l laoh mha me tda krounea mha anet sraleanh
